text: cilar parayum: "avar munnalayirunnu. nalamattet avarute nayayum.” vere cilar parayum: "avar ancalukalan. aramattet avarute nayayum.” iteakkeyum abhetika karyannale sambandhicca uham matraman. iniyum cilar parayum: "avar eluperan. ettamattet avarute nayayum.” parayuka: "enre nathanan avarute ennattepparri erram nannayariyunnavan.” alpam cilarkkealike arkkum avarepparri ariyilla. atinal vyaktamaya arivinre atisthanattilallate avarute karyattil ni tarkkikkarut. janannalilareatum ni avarute karyattil abhiprayam ceadikkarut
